item.title: Trump Need Not Bend To The 19-State Lawfare Coup Trying To Thwart His Treasury
item.description: The president, as the chief executive officer of the country, is not obligated to heel every time an out-of-control federal judge jerks his leash.

item.title: J.D. Vance Warns Europe That Its Greatest Threat Comes ‘From Within’
item.description: Vice President J.D. Vance warned European leaders in Munich the greatest challenges threatening democracy today are from within.

item.title: Leftists’ Claims The SAVE Act Won’t Let Married Women Vote Are An Insult To Their Intelligence
item.description: They are saying women who figured out how to change their name are not smart enough to provide documentation of that name change.
